content: thumb 36 sts k 25 rounds decrease *ssk k13 k2tog k1 repeat from * to end 4sts decreased repeat decrease six more times 8 sts divide sts and graft as on outer thumb repeat all instructions given for outer thumb 15 held sts + 1 picked up k all sts for 11 rounds k2tog around 8 sts k2tog around 4 sts break yarn and pull through remaining sts draw tight & bind off © 2025 galt house of yarn all rights reserved v1 1 www galthouseofyarn ca
